long_description: The signature wrap frame from Spy, Dirk Sunglasses are built from virtually indestructible Grilamid nylon with shatter-resistant polycarbonate lenses. Lenses block 89% of visible light and 100% of harmful UV rays. Spy polycarbonate lenses are injected in a unique tapered shape to provide optically correct, distortion-free viewing at all angles. Grilamid nylon frames stand up to UV exposure and extreme temperatures, and are resistant to stress cracking.
short_description: The signature wrap frame from Spy, Dirk Sunglasses are built from virtually indestructible Grilamid nylon with shatter-resistant polycarbonate lenses.
